    • Constructor Detail

      • MetaClassifier

        public MetaClassifier(java.lang.Double[] y,
              java.lang.Double[][] x,
              java.lang.String[] p,
              java.lang.Double trainRatio)
        Default constructor to create a MetaClassifier for the given data through training rounds.
        Parameters:
        y - the target/ideal/correct values that the MetaClassifer should learn to classify.
        x - independent observations (indexed in the outer array) of each parameter's value (indexed in the inner array).
        p - independent variable (model parameter) names or descriptions.
        trainRatio - the percentage of the dataset to use as training data in each round.

    • Method Detail

      • runTrainingRounds

        public void runTrainingRounds(int numRounds)
        Train the MetaClassifier on the dataset for the given number of rounds.
        Parameters:
        numRounds - the number of training rounds to run.

      • getNumParameters

        public int getNumParameters()
        Returns the number of independent variables (model parameters) in the dataset.
        Returns:
        the number of parameters.

      • getNumAlgorithms

        Returns:
        the number of algorithms.

      • getparameterScores

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Double,java.lang.String> getparameterScores()
        Returns a TreeMap of each parameter's performance score wherein each Double key is mapped to a String description of the parameter.
        Returns:
        a TreeMap of each parameter's performance score.

      • getParameterScoreReport

        Generates a report on the performance of each parameter.

      • getAlgorithmScores

      • classify

        public double[] classify(double[][] data)
        Classifies new unseen data based on what the MetaClassifer learned during training.
        Parameters:
        data - the new unseen data to classify.
        Returns:
        the resulting data classified by the MetaClassifer.
